column2: title=News from the Shire and Beyond - Studies on Tolkien
image=[[File:News from the Shire and Beyond - Studies on Tolkien.jpg
followedby=[[Root and Branch - Approaches towards Understanding Tolkien]]

column1: '''''News from the Shire and Beyond - Studies on Tolkien''''' is the first book of Walking Tree's ''[[Cormarë Series]]''. It is a collection of several essays.
* Peter Buchs and [[Thomas M. Honegger]]: "Tolkien Studies: News from the Shire and Beyond Indeed"
* [[Nils-Lennart Johannesson]]: "The Speech of the Individual and of the Community in The Lord of the Rings"
* [[Thomas M. Honegger]]: "From Bag End to Lórien: the Creation of a Literary World"
* Patrick Näf: "Middle Earth: The Collectible Card Game — Powerplay in the World of Tolkien"
* Peter Buchs: "Middle-earth: the Wizards - the Representation of Tolkien's World in Game"
* [[Andreas Bigger]]: "The Meeting of the Istari" (Das Treffen der Istari), a play. (First edition only).
